activities: Oceanos is provided personal information from its employees along with its customer’s business contacts. Oceanos stores such information to support analysis and to apply as suppression files during the procurement of third party data. For complete information, see the full Oceanos Privacy Policy at www.oceanosinc.com/privacypolicy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client and customer. This does not include manually processed data.
recoursemech: Cooperation and compliance with the EU Data Protection Authorities’ (DPAs) Panel, as well as the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland.
